content: add rich holiday texture to your home with the puff christmas stocking crochet pattern this beautifully detailed stocking uses flowing puff-stitch to create a woven and braided dimensional look that instantly stands out on the mantel perfect for christmas decorating gift giving or holiday craft fairs this stocking works up quickly while still looking impressively intricate > ** watch free tutorial here 1 ** designed for makers who love texture the puff-braid stitch repeat creates a thick cozy fabric that holds its shape beautifully whether you choose classic christmas colors or a bold gradient yarn this stocking brings a modern yet timeless handmade charm to your festive décor ❗ important notes all patterns are written in english us terms due to the digital nature of the file no refunds can be issued finished size length 15 inches/ 39 cm width 5 inches/13cm difficulty easy written in standard american terms yarn #3 dk weight yarn mary maxim prism 100% acrylic 100g/3 5oz 265m/290yds -
